tagline: Automated video editing tools for content creators

faq.question: What is AutoStream?
faq.answer: AutoStream is a SaaS product that provides automated video editing tools for content creators.

faq.question: What's the difference between Basic and Pro plans?
faq.answer: Basic Plan offers 10 videos/month at 720p for $29/month. Pro Plan offers unlimited videos at 4K resolution with AI captions for $79/month.

faq.question: Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: Yes, you can get a full refund within 7 days of purchase. No refunds are available after 7 days.

faq.question: What support options are available?
faq.answer: Basic Plan includes email support during business hours. Pro Plan includes 24/7 support.

faq.question: What platforms do you support?
faq.answer: AutoStream works great for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and other content platforms.
